entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add more incremental docs #72149
  • Very slow build - can't build project #72148
  • Roslyn fails to verify nullable reference types' safety in collection expressions #72142
  • dotnet 8.0.200 breaking change - wrong exception is thrown when rethrow in a catch inside another catch using async methods #72141
  • Restore failed due to Package Source Mapping #72140
  • `RazorSourceGenerator` failed to initialize when building ASP.NET/Razor project in VS 17.10 Preview 1 #72139
  • Razor/Roslyn Cohosting: Use `#line` directives instead of `ISpanMappingService` #72136

Closed

  • Spread Operator with possible null value gives no compile time warning if nullable enabled #72121
  • Incorrect cast-can-be-removed suggestion with lambdas and implicit operators. #72134
  • CSC Crash: This program location is thought to be unreachable. File='/_/src/Compilers/CSharp/Portable/Symbols/FunctionTypeSymbol.cs' Line=144 #72056
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations in AbstractRecommendationServiceBasedCompletionProvider.GetSymbolsAsync #72157
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Strike out obsolete symbols #72156
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Incorporate underlying type's hierarchy into overload resolution #72155
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Remove unused OmniSharp extension method #72154
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153
  • Remove code not used in product #72152
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove at most 1 end of line preceding redundant nullable directives #72150
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • WIP: Remove solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations during check for duplicate analyzers #72144
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Merge Lock object feature to main #72137
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type

Merged

  • Fix crash in designer discovery #72151
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump a few transitively included packages to 8.0 #72092
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Bail out more quickly when doing nav-to searches #72146
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make method abstract and force subclasses to implement #72145
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72107
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Refactor how docs are added/removed in SolutionState #72143
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove legacy unit testing type #72132
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Address more PROTOTYPE comments #72113
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Fix remove-unnecessary-cast with necessary delegate cast #72135
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Always visit conversions in array initializers #72131
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reuse compilation tracker states when possible. #72111
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Defer parsing syntax trees when computing frozen partial solutions #72090
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined conversions #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Support more than one frozen source generated document at once #72115
    Area-IDE
  • Add caching for Regex creation in AnalyzerConfigSet #72114
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Simplify how frozen partial documents are produced. #72106
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #72127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add invariant around nullable conditional state #72072
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, 17.10
  • Include SourceLink file in CoreCompile dependency checks #72109
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Patterns: Expand non-negative sets when performing certain operations #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
